pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: ミーティングは隔週でやってます。
lessons.english: Meetings are held every other week.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine's release day is on Wednesday every two weeks.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine's release day is every two weeks on Wednesday.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine is out fortnightly on Wednesdays.

lessons.japanese: トムは隔週休２日制の会社に勤めてるんだ。
lessons.english: Every other week, Tom's company gives him a second day off work.

lessons.japanese: 私の両親は離婚してるので、隔週末だけお父さんと過ごします。
lessons.english: Because my parents are divorced, I only spend time with my dad every other weekend.

lessons.japanese: トムは隔週休２日制の会社に勤めてるんだ。
lessons.english: Every other week, Tom's company gives him a second day off work.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine's release day is on Wednesday every two weeks.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine's release day is every two weeks on Wednesday.

lessons.japanese: この雑誌の発売日は、隔週水曜日です。
lessons.english: This magazine is out fortnightly on Wednesdays.

lessons.japanese: 私の両親は離婚してるので、隔週末だけお父さんと過ごします。
lessons.english: Because my parents are divorced, I only spend time with my dad every other weekend.

lessons.english: Meetings are held every other week.
